title: Advice for engaging with and questioning your doctor
content: Best practice: Send them an email before your appointment to give them a chance to reflect your questions, read up on it, and have their point of view ready. Please remember, you’re still the consumer, so if the doctor is utterly dismissive of what you want to discuss, then you have a right to go get another doctor. If you’re not getting an answer that you’re comfortable with from your doctor, you should go find another doctor.
